content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I can help you set up an appointment for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs. May I have your name to get started?
Thank you, Bryan! Can I get your home address so we can check if you’re in our service area?
Great, thank you! What type of service do you need help with today—plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
It’s plumbing. I’ve got a toilet that won’t stop running.
Thanks for letting me know, Bryan. When would be a good time for a plumber to come by and take a look at your toilet? We have availability this week and next.
Honestly, I’m really swamped with work and travel this month. I don’t think I’ll have any time to schedule something before June.

That’s totally understandable, Bryan. If you’d like, I can make a note to check back in with you in June, or you can reach out to us whenever you’re ready. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
Thanks, but no, I’ll get in touch again later. Appreciate it!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule appointment at this time.
